SELECT STRIP(WA01) AS WA01, STRIP(WA02) AS WA02, STRIP(WA03) AS WA03, STRIP(WA04) AS WA04, STRIP(WA05) AS WA05, STRIP(WA06) AS WA06, STRIP(WA07) AS WA07, STRIP(WA08) AS WA08, STRIP(WA09) AS WA09, STRIP(WA10) AS WA10, STRIP(WA11) AS WA11, STRIP(WA12) AS WA12, STRIP(WA13) AS WA13, STRIP(WA14) AS WA14, STRIP(WA15) AS WA15, STRIP(WA16) AS WA16, STRIP(WA17) AS WA17, STRIP(WA18) AS WA18, STRIP(WA19) AS WA19, STRIP(WA20) AS WA20, STRIP(WA21) AS WA21, STRIP(WA22) AS WA22, STRIP(WA23) AS WA23, STRIP(WA24) AS WA24, STRIP(WA25) AS WA25, STRIP(WA26) AS WA26, STRIP(WA27) AS WA27, STRIP(WA28) AS WA28, STRIP(WA29) AS WA29, STRIP(WA30) AS WA30, STRIP(WA31) AS WA31, STRIP(WA32) AS WA32, STRIP(WA33) AS WA33, STRIP(WA34) AS WA34, STRIP(WA35) AS WA35, STRIP(WA36) AS WA36, STRIP(WA37) AS WA37, STRIP(WA38) AS WA38, STRIP(WA39) AS WA39, STRIP(WA40) AS WA40, STRIP(WA41) AS WA41, STRIP(WA42) AS WA42, STRIP(WA43) AS WA43, STRIP(WA44) AS WA44, STRIP(WA45) AS WA45, STRIP(WA46) AS WA46, STRIP(WA47) AS WA47, STRIP(WA48) AS WA48, STRIP(WA60) AS WA60, STRIP(WA61) AS WA61, STRIP(WA62) AS WA62
FROM COM051WA

STRIP(WA04) = #wa04#
STRIP(WA60) != 'X'
STRIP(WA61) > #wa61GreatThanSomeday#

SELECT STRIP(WA01) AS WA01, STRIP(WA02) AS WA02, STRIP(WA03) AS WA03, STRIP(WA04) AS WA04, STRIP(WA05) AS WA05, STRIP(WA06) AS WA06, STRIP(WA07) AS WA07, STRIP(WA08) AS WA08, STRIP(WA09) AS WA09, STRIP(WA10) AS WA10, STRIP(WA11) AS WA11, STRIP(WA12) AS WA12, STRIP(WA13) AS WA13, STRIP(WA14) AS WA14, STRIP(WA15) AS WA15, STRIP(WA16) AS WA16, STRIP(WA17) AS WA17, STRIP(WA18) AS WA18, STRIP(WA19) AS WA19, STRIP(WA20) AS WA20, STRIP(WA21) AS WA21, STRIP(WA22) AS WA22, STRIP(WA23) AS WA23, STRIP(WA24) AS WA24, STRIP(WA25) AS WA25, STRIP(WA26) AS WA26, STRIP(WA27) AS WA27, STRIP(WA28) AS WA28, STRIP(WA29) AS WA29, STRIP(WA30) AS WA30, STRIP(WA31) AS WA31, STRIP(WA32) AS WA32, STRIP(WA33) AS WA33, STRIP(WA34) AS WA34, STRIP(WA35) AS WA35, STRIP(WA36) AS WA36, STRIP(WA37) AS WA37, STRIP(WA38) AS WA38, STRIP(WA39) AS WA39, STRIP(WA40) AS WA40, STRIP(WA41) AS WA41, STRIP(WA42) AS WA42, STRIP(WA43) AS WA43, STRIP(WA44) AS WA44, STRIP(WA45) AS WA45, STRIP(WA46) AS WA46, STRIP(WA47) AS WA47, STRIP(WA48) AS WA48, STRIP(WA60) AS WA60, STRIP(WA61) AS WA61, STRIP(WA62) AS WA62
FROM COM051WA
STRIP(wa60) = ''
STRIP(WA04) = #wa04#
STRIP(WA60) != 'X'
STRIP(WA61) > #wa61GreatThanSomeday#

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COM051WA
STRIP(wa60) = ''
STRIP(WA04) = #wa04#
STRIP(WA60) != 'X'
STRIP(WA61) > #wa61GreatThanSomeday#
SELECT DISTINCT STRIP(WA04) AS WA04 FROM COM051WA WHERE STRIP(WA04) != '' AND STRIP(WA60) != 'X' AND STRIP(WA61) > '20210713' ORDER BY STRIP(WA04) ASC FETCH FIRST 1000 ROW ONLY
sqlMap.insert: insert into COM051WA (WA01, WA02, WA03, WA04, WA05, WA06, WA07, WA08, WA09, WA10, WA11, WA12, WA13, WA14, WA15, WA16, WA17, WA18, WA19, WA20, WA21, WA22, WA23, WA24, WA25, WA26, WA27, WA28, WA29, WA30, WA31, WA32, WA33, WA34, WA35, WA36, WA37, WA38, WA39, WA40, WA41, WA42, WA43, WA44, WA45, WA46, WA47, WA48, WA60, WA61, WA62) values (#wa01:VARCHAR#, #wa02:VARCHAR#, #wa03:VARCHAR#, #wa04:VARCHAR#, #wa05:VARCHAR#, #wa06:VARCHAR#, #wa07:VARCHAR#, #wa08:VARCHAR#, #wa09:VARCHAR#, #wa10:VARCHAR#, #wa11:VARCHAR#, #wa12:VARCHAR#, #wa13:VARCHAR#, #wa14:VARCHAR#, #wa15:VARCHAR#, #wa16:VARCHAR#, #wa17:VARCHAR#, #wa18:VARCHAR#, #wa19:VARCHAR#, #wa20:VARCHAR#, #wa21:VARCHAR#, #wa22:VARCHAR#, #wa23:VARCHAR#, #wa24:VARCHAR#, #wa25:VARCHAR#, #wa26:VARCHAR#, #wa27:VARCHAR#, #wa28:VARCHAR#, #wa29:VARCHAR#, #wa30:VARCHAR#, #wa31:VARCHAR#, #wa32:VARCHAR#, #wa33:VARCHAR#, #wa34:VARCHAR#, #wa35:VARCHAR#, #wa36:VARCHAR#, #wa37:VARCHAR#, #wa38:VARCHAR#, #wa39:VARCHAR#, #wa40:VARCHAR#, #wa41:DECIMAL#, #wa42:VARCHAR#, #wa43:VARCHAR#, #wa44:VARCHAR#, #wa45:VARCHAR#, #wa46:VARCHAR#, #wa47:VARCHAR#, #wa48:VARCHAR#, #wa60:VARCHAR#, #wa61:DECIMAL#, #wa62:DECIMAL#)
